programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Sandy Prince is enjoying a swim in a river when she is attacked by a crocodile. Plus, a cougar leaps out at Phil Anderson in Washington State, can he fight it off?

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii yksinaisella joella.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa Washingtoniin toimintaa ja rentoutumista yhdistavan valimuodon. Sisaan tullaan heiluvaa siltaa pitkin ja koysiradalla metsan halki. Jokaisen hurjapaan unelma!

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Pariskunta tilaa Antoniolta ulkoleikkitilan, joka sopii heidan savannikissalleen ja neljalle hoitokissalleen. Rakennelmaan syntyy linkitettyja kavelyalueita ja kiipeilypintoja.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Taistelu hengesta. Kenttatyon johtaja DaBolt ja tutkija Barkley tutkivat ilmoituksia laittomasta koiratappelusta ja loytavat kolme kipeasti apua tarvitsevaa pitbullia.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Elama ja kuolema. Sarjassa seurataan AHS:n tutkijoiden ja EAMT-hatalaakintajoukon tyota naiden suorittaessa elainjulmuuteen liittyvia tutkimuksia ja hatapelastuksia.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Paul de Gelder ja James Glancy hyppaavat lentokoneesta kilometrin korkeudesta kokeillakseen millaista on syoksya maailman kaukaisimmille haita kuhiseville vesille.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Sandy Prince is enjoying a swim in a river when she is attacked by a crocodile. Plus, a cougar leaps out at Phil Anderson in Washington State, can he fight it off?

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson kohtaa Marleyn, joka aina lahtiessaan aiheuttaa veriloylyn seka kissakaksikon, joka tuhoaa kotinsa. Katso, miten Jacksonin ihmeelliset menetelmat oikein toimivat.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Irwinin perhe on vuoden kestaneiden metsapalopelastustoimien ja surrealistisen maailmanlaajuisen pandemiasulun jalkeen valmiita uuteen kauteen ja avaavat Australian elaintarhansa uudelleen ja palaavat rakkaan tyonsa pariin hoitamaan elaimia.

programme.title: Take Back the Harbour
programme.desc: Osterit palaavat New Yorkin Governor-saarelle uraauurtava suojeluohjelman ansiosta. Niista on hyotya koko satama-alueen ymparistolle.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Akvaarioilla on tarkea tehtava merielaman sailyttajina ja suojelupaikkoina kautta maailman. Georgian akvaario antaa esimerkkeja paivittaisista merkittavista tapahtumistaan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Amy leikkaa kepin keihastaman koiran. Elainlaakari Baier hoitaa kiimaista Kino-koiraa, joka on steriloitu jo kahdesti.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kalifornialaisravintola tilaa akvaarion uuteen toimipaikkaansa Santa Monicaan. Omistajat haluavat akvaarioon nostalgisen teeman ja muistoja sen 70-vuotisen taipaleen varrelta.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Alkaa uustintana. Karhun pelastus. Dokumentaarinen sarja seuraa Animal Services Department -yksikon tyota Miamissa. Villielainagentit pyydetaan pelastamaan auton alle jaanytta mustakarhua. Tutkijat kuulustelevat laittoman sianteurastusoperaation omistajaa.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kun valvontakamera nappaa kuvan kissaa hakkaavasta miehesta, tutkijoiden on saatava hanet kiinni. Laiminlyodyt koirat ovat kuoleman partaalla ja pollot pelastetaan purkualueelta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Idaholaisen perheen riesana ovat romahtamisen partaalla oleva mokki ja sadan kanan katrasta uhkaava saalispeto. Raneyt saapuvat paikalle tekemaan tilasta asumiskelpoisen.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Boone saa nimettoman vinkin laittomasta peuranmetsastajasta. McGee kuulustelee miesta, jolla on hallussaan myrkyllisia kuparipaakaarmeita.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa Washingtoniin toimintaa ja rentoutumista yhdistavan valimuodon. Sisaan tullaan heiluvaa siltaa pitkin ja koysiradalla metsan halki. Jokaisen hurjapaan unelma!

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Villalobos saa kutsun Dog Bowl -tapahtumaan, mika tarjoaa mahtavia adoptiomahdollisuuksia pelastetuille koirille. Pariskunta etsii ensimmaista adoptiokoiraansa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Irwinin perhe on vuoden kestaneiden metsapalopelastustoimien ja surrealistisen maailmanlaajuisen pandemiasulun jalkeen valmiita uuteen kauteen ja avaavat Australian elaintarhansa uudelleen ja palaavat rakkaan tyonsa pariin hoitamaan elaimia.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Amy leikkaa kepin keihastaman koiran. Elainlaakari Baier hoitaa kiimaista Kino-koiraa, joka on steriloitu jo kahdesti.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin.

programme.title: Bronxin elaintarha
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 5. New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia. (The Zoo, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Syvalla Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa selvitaan vain yhteispelilla.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Idaholaisen perheen riesana ovat romahtamisen partaalla oleva mokki ja sadan kanan katrasta uhkaava saalispeto. Raneyt saapuvat paikalle tekemaan tilasta asumiskelpoisen.

programme.title: I Was Prey: Shark Week
programme.desc: Vaara vaanii Tyynenmeren pinnan alla. Iso valkohai tekee yllatyshyokkayksen uimassa olevan naisen kimppuun. Tiikerihai ahdistelee keihaskalastajia.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Onkologi Jenny Helm hoitaa rakastettua perhekissa Mishaa, jonka rinnasta on loytynyt kyhmy. Irtokoiranpentu Ellie saapuu uuden tyyppiseen leikkaukseen.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa ensimmaisen ulkomaankohteensa Norjaan. Yhdessa paikallisen rakennusmies Froden kanssa nousee puumaja kahdeksan metrin korkeuteen, upeilla jarvinakymilla.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin.

programme.title: Bronxin elaintarha
programme.desc: Hyppaa mukaan Bronxin elaintarhan elamaan! Paivittainen toiminta tuo laadukasta huolenpitoa elaimille seka tietoa villielaimista ja luonnonsuojelusta yleisolle.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Jaksossa nahdaan ruokaa varasteleva ja taloa tuhoava kissa, jaakaapissa tuhoa aiheuttava kani ja koira, joka jahtaa jaateloautoa niin kauan, etta se saa mehujaatelon.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: "Donut Mania" on Brettin uusin liikeidea ja nyt vietetaan sen isoja avajaisia. Wayde ja tiimi onnittelevat uutta yritysta yllatysakvaariolla.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Miamin hylatyt. Miamin elainpoliisit kokevat tehtavan itselleen erityisen laheiseksi, kun he loytavat kaksi jo adoptoitua koiraa kadulta avun tarpeessa.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Surua riittaa tutkija Labradan yrittaessa pelastaa omistajiensa hylkaaman sairaan koiran. Nuori tytto pelastaa hevosen, joka on jatetty ilman ruokaa ja vetta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Raneyt vierailevat romahtamaisillaan olevalla omavaraistilalla Smoky Mountains -vuorilla. He kokoavat kiireesti kayttokelpoisen rakennuksen ennen seuraavaa myrskya.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Riistanvalvojat loytavat punailvekselle uuden kodin ja tutkivat laittomasti tapetun peuran tapausta. Valvojat Chelsea ja Ben tarkastavat kaupallisia osterinpyyntialuksia.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa ensimmaisen ulkomaankohteensa Norjaan. Yhdessa paikallisen rakennusmies Froden kanssa nousee puumaja kahdeksan metrin korkeuteen, upeilla jarvinakymilla.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tiimi ryntaa pelastamaan vilkkaasti liikennoidylta valtatielta loytyneen koiran. Massachusettsista saapuu perhe etsimaan uutta nelijalkaista perheenjasenta.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 8, osa 8. Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Tim, Allan ja Jasmine kokevat Alaskan ilmaston raakuuden lahtiessaan retkelle, jolla ylitetaan jokia ja jaatikoita ja kamppaillaan lumimyrskyssa.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat puivat isojalkaan eli maailman tunnetuimpaan mystiseen olioon liittyvia teorioita. Uudet todisteet kertovat, etta se voi olla paljon hurjempi otus kuin on uskottu.

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Hirvio sisallani
programme.desc: Vauva sairastuu selittamattomasti ja saa hengitysvaikeuksia. Miehella on jotain elavaa nolossa paikassa. Naisen painonnousu askarruttaa asiantuntijoita.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: "Donut Mania" on Brettin uusin liikeidea ja nyt vietetaan sen isoja avajaisia. Wayde ja tiimi onnittelevat uutta yritysta yllatysakvaariolla.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Miamin hylatyt. Miamin elainpoliisit kokevat tehtavan itselleen erityisen laheiseksi, kun he loytavat kaksi jo adoptoitua koiraa kadulta avun tarpeessa.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Surua riittaa tutkija Labradan yrittaessa pelastaa omistajiensa hylkaaman sairaan koiran. Nuori tytto pelastaa hevosen, joka on jatetty ilman ruokaa ja vetta.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Tim, Allan ja Jasmine kokevat Alaskan ilmaston raakuuden lahtiessaan retkelle, jolla ylitetaan jokia ja jaatikoita ja kamppaillaan lumimyrskyssa.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Firefighters battle through apocalyptic scenes on Australias Kangaroo Island as it is besieged by deadly bushfires. In Kansas, two hard-core tornado chasers allow a tourist to ride along with them.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In New South Wales, Australia, the worst bushfires in recent history attack multiple towns, overwhelming firefighters and trapping tourists at a lake front caravan park. A 6.4 magnitude earthquake in the Philippines catches everyone off-guard. In England, its a fight for survival as a group of cavers attempt to rescue their colleague from the flooded section of an active cave. And in Kansas, two tornado chasers intercept a terrifying twister.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Hailstones produce an original work of Inupiaq art, and Cole Sturgis ventures into the wilds of the Southeast on a life-or-death hunt.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets the Powell family who are living an off-grid existence in a hidden valley in the Black Mountains in Wales. While there he helps plant the biggest new woodland in Wales for a generation.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: Joanna heads towards the Danube Delta, one of the last great wilderness areas remaining in Europe, full of birdlife including the majestic Pelican. At the mouth of the river, on Romanias Black Sea coast, Joanna bids farewell to the Danube and reflects on her amazing journey.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Seventy-one million years ago lived a teenage Albertosaurus - a faster, nimbler relative of T. rex. She had to earn her place in a deadly, ferocious pack or risk starvation. Today, palaeontologists in western Canada are unearthing her remains, allowing us to imagine her story. Based on real-world evidence, stunning VFX recreate her encounters, from hunting pterosaurs to fighting the dominant matriarch and battling for survival in the brutal late Cretaceous world.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark
programme.desc: Steve Backshall is taking ten novice divers on one Deadly mission - to dive with sharks in Bimini, the shark capital of the world, with the ultimate goal being to qualify as scuba divers.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: A man and his 19-year-old daughter struggle to survive raging fires in Australia, and a pair of skiers are swallowed by an avalanche in the French Alps.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: Joannas emotional exploration begins at the rivers source, Germanys Black Forest mountains, ends at the Romanian/Ukrainian border, and marks two key anniversaries. The first is D-Day - the beginning of the end of World War Two and a brief era of freedom. 1/4

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben ventures deep into the freezing tundra of Outer Mongolia to meet a couple who left their comfortable life in America to become missionaries in this remote corner of the world.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As the cold season wanes in the Arctic, winter does not go quietly into the night.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the largest bicycle factory in Britain which produces 150 folding bike every 24 hours and joins a multi-stage manual production line to make his own bicycle. Meanwhile Cherry Healey gets some tips from Cycling Team GB to help us all improve our pedal power, including how lowering your body position can make a 10 per cent improvement to speed and efficiency. And historian Ruth Goodman reveals that folding bikes date back to the 1870s, and how 70,000 folding `parabikes" were manufactured during the Second World War, some of which played a role in the D-Day landings

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: Asia has the longest coastline of any continent and the earths richest coral reefs. This episode explores Asias waters, as spectacular as they are diverse, and never-seen-before animal behaviour.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: A tornado touchdown terrorises a school in Texas. The violent volcanic eruption in Tonga and a tsunami leaves residents trapped with nowhere to go and pilots battle extreme cross winds.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: Osteoporosis is a disease in which bones become brittle and easily broken. It is more common in women, and usually worsens with age. Michael Mosley sees how to keep bodies, bones and muscles healthy.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: In Slovakia, Joanna traces Danube tributaries up to the top of the snow-capped Tatras. In Budapest she explores the river by boat and rides a unique childrens railway, as well as discovering the citys Jewish heritage.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Alaskans are faced with adversity as they confront the unknown in the dead of winter.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads to a secret location in the USAs Appalachian Mountains to live with forest dweller Tod Kershaw, a former engineer whose wild tribe must scavenge other peoples waste to stay alive.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: Asia is the most mountainous continent on earth. From the tropical south to its barren centre, its highest places are home to some of our planets most remarkable wildlife.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Five hundred employees and some mind-boggling machines convert a tanker full of sugar from Norfolk into a hundred million individual sweets within just 24 hours. 5/6

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans confront the environment, and themselves, as winter bears down.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben journeys to the Suffolk countryside and a secretive patch of woodland, to spend the week with unique character Will, 50, who could be described as a true British caveman.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Based on an unprecedented discovery in Alberta, Canada, this episode tells the epic tale of one of the largest dinosaur herds that ever lived, the Pachyrhinosaurus, through the eyes of one of its youngest members, Albie.

programme.desc: Programme to be confirmed.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In the Grand Canyon, a massive microburst causes a dangerous deluge of mud and rocks to barrel down on a group of kayakers - leaving them in need of urgent medical assistance. In Iowa, a rare derecho storm - similar to an inland hurricane - is caught on camera.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle That Fell to Earth
programme.desc: Sixteen minutes from landing, mission control lose contact with the crew. The fears of some Nasa engineers are coming true. Following the disaster, Nasa comes under pressure to give answers.

programme.title: Asia

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Hurricane Ida unleashes terror in New York City, a lakeside resort turns into a ball of flames and wolves surround a snowbound tent in the Canadian Arctic.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: Michael Mosley meets a 73-year-old jazz musician in Chicago and discovers why playing music can prevent the hearing loss. He also reveals why aerobic exercise can help prevent the onset of glaucoma.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: In Budapest Joanna explores the river by boat and rides a unique childrens railway, as well as discovering the citys Jewish heritage.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue attempts ice fishing in the hopes of discovering a new food source before her journey comes to an end. Jessie races to his beloved camp before Spring conditions settle in.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to the Atlas Mountains in Morocco to meet a couple who shunned the American dream to live in a remote mud house, but times are tough and theyre running out of money and food.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: In the remote reaches of Asias frozen north, creatures must overcome unique challenges, finding exceptional ways to thrive in a hostile world that pushes life to its very limits.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits the UKs largest sports shoe factory to see how 3,500 pairs of trainers are made every day, before meeting the man who comes up with the latest designs. Cherry Healey gets hands-on in a tannery, helping to process thousands of rawhides into finished leather for the nations shoes, and finds out how a ballet company painstakingly create 250,000 ballet shoes per year. Ruth Goodman reveals how, when the sewing machine was first introduced into shoe factories in the mid-19th century, traditional shoemakers went on strike to rebel against joining a restrictive production line

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans rediscover old practises to get through the heart of winter.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to a unique, tiny island in the Scottish Hebrides where he meets ex-social care worker Philip, who has embraced a new way of life in this small, alternative community. In his company, Ben spends the week cut off from the outside world, in an old lighthouse keepers cottage, where he experiences the unusual routines of the islands community.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle revisits Rauri on Rathlin Island, who left HR for off-grid life. They repaint Rauris house and discuss his health struggles, and a daring journey he made to help those in need.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: In Slovakia, Joanna traces Danube tributaries up to the top of the snow-capped Tatras. In Budapest she explores the river by boat and rides a unique childrens railway, as well as discovering the citys Jewish heritage.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In Nepal, heavy snow creates a treacherous situation for trekkers in the Himalayan mountains, when an earthquake triggered avalanche sweeps into a busy base camp. In Pennsylvania, good Samaritans rush to save three children trapped inside a semi-submerged car. 9/13

programme.title: Super Surgeons: A Chance At Life
programme.desc: Ex-navy pilot Rich has a huge 16cm tumour running from his jaw to his heart. Meanwhile, nearly all the organs in Tracys pelvis need removal to combat her stage four bowel cancer.

programme.desc: Vain kolme kovinta amatoorileipuria on jaljella, ja finaali voi alkaa. But that shant stop a plucky young buck and his devoted squire from fulfilling their destiny. With the assistance of a quite staggeringly incompetent Dwarf called Alan, a new sword is forged and the Quest continue-eth!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is livid when an online test keeps telling him that his character-type is The Loser. Hes convinced the only way to shake off this label is to do the opposite of everything he normally would. But Gumball suppressing his natural instincts leaves a vacuum, a Gumball-shaped hole that someone has to fill. That someone is Tobias, who starts turning the whole show into a cliched sitcom.

programme.desc: Carmen en Alan maken iedereen gek met hun verliefderigheid. Door zijn opmerkingen drijft Gumball het gelukkige paar uit elkaar. Tot groot plezier van Masami.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one thats perfect but is outraged when hes told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers hes one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find its closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their relaxing holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chep asks Mush-Mush and Lilit to go storm-watching and they refuse, Lilit feels bad and convinces Mush-Mush to join their friend.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Fung and Miff have come across a rare piece of bark struck by lightning.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep knows so many things about nature that Mush-Mush and Lilit are confident hes not far from being an expert like Mushpot.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has been watching Sushi-Mushi test new compost fritters recipes. When Mush-Mush gets to taste one, he cant believe it: Sushi-Mushi has cooked the perfect fritter.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers lead Sushi-Mushi to believe that Pickled Swampost is Mushpots favourite dish when he cant stand it. Now they must try to stop Sushi-Mushi from serving this horrible food to Mushpot!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is the only Mushable who cant bend a small branch back to catapult himself between two trees. He feels weak and embarrassed. But when strength doesnt work, Chep realizes that its all in the technique!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. When "Happy Birthday" rings out, the surpriiiiiise! is as great for Grizzy, who is trying to take a nap after a hearty meal, as it is for the birthday Lemming hero in question. From that point on, Grizzy has only one objective: stop the din, which is not at all helping his migraine headache. But for the Lemmings, the party must go on at any price.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzys adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. But the Lemmings, who are riding on the back of a bucking caribou, realize that the flower makes their mount sneeze, which only makes the game ten times more fun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American chest. They are communicating vessels, so if he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other, regardless of the distance between them. This should satisfy Grizzys natural lazy streak, unless the Lemmings realise the incredible games they could play with the magic vases.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by and it can even stop time and movement in ones surroundings. This will give him a sure advantage over the Lemmings, provided of course they dont get their hands on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his TV snack by a strange flow of incongruous objects that have been transformed into hot-air balloons. When he sees the Lemmings onboard these curious zeppelins, Grizzy understands that he will quickly have to confiscate their helium tank and balloons if he wants to relax in front of the TV.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers with great delight that the ranger has purchased a brand new multifunction Stressless recliner. But even an armchair designed for well-being - the ultimate in relaxation - can used for other purposes by the Lemmings, who transform it into a fearsome multi-game chair.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play kite-surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy notices that the she-bear hes in love with watches the kite perform arabesques in the sky with admirat

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy snatches the last jar of chocolate spread out from under the noses of the Lemmings. In exchange, he offers them the toy stuck inside the lid: a mini-flute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play a new game, floating like flags in the breeze from the fan set on maximum. But Grizzy quickly rids the living room of this interference.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun tearing down their Kapla block buildings, which they rebuild just as fast. Grizzy finds that the she-bear hes in love with is impressed by the construction.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own No Littering signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a date to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one thats perfect but is outraged when hes told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers hes one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find its closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their relaxing holiday!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! Lilits good deed has her regretting her gift - shes basically just a lamp! But when her light goes out, Lilit instantly regrets regretting it: she wants her gift back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he wont. And Lilit, who is too honest to keep a secret, promises she wont let Chep know what the surprise is. Both of them find this so hard! But Mush-Mush is one step ahead of them...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing in front of all the other Mushables... who are terrified at the idea! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. But this just shows that Mushpot is no longer able to do all those things. Sigh! However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush cant figure out why his sense foot keeps buzzing like crazy... until an earthquake shakes the forest. Mush-Mush is sure he predicted it! Convinced he can now predict the future, Mush-Mush starts making predictions for everyone in Mushton...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements. When carried out, the exercises generate a ball of energy! The Lemmings test out the sequence of movements on Grizzy, until he is evicted from the cabin and falls onto the temple in turn. His fall unveils a new sequence of movements on a fresco that could create an even stronger energy flow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a party for his beloved she-bear. But his doubles artificial intelligence leaves a lot to be desired.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzys in love thinks shes a Lemming. Grizzy thinks that another little well-placed bang over the head will knock her ideas back into place. The only problem is that the Lemmings, who are delighted to have a new playmate, have no intention of letting him proceed with his plan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When a meteorite falls not far from the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make anyone who eats them grow to disproportionate sizes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery with an old treasure card that indicates the location of a treasure. Upon closer look, the representation of this treasure greatly resembles a giant jar of chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he brandishes a native american scepter that the Lemmings brought home with other antique objects, Grizzy sees the Lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. One of them has escaped the spell, but he will have to confront both Grizzy and his fellow creatures in order to recover the scepter and reverse the spell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear that hes in love with by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artists back is turned, the Lemmings gnaw at the work of art in order to transform it into a toboggan slide. Grizzy must succeed in getting rid of the Lemmings without his model realizing whats going on. An Art in itself!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om het mysterie op te lossen rondom een spookachtige artiest die ronddwaalt in haar voormalige concerthal, moet de gang doen alsof ze een rockband zijn! Maar kunnen ze de zaak oplossen voor dat Velma het podium op moet en moet zingen?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred is excited to visit The Vault - a high security prison from which no convict has ever escaped. But when the ghost of Stealing Stan (JOHN DiMAGGIO), an inmate who always claimed to be innocent, terrorizes the prison, Fred has to solve the mystery and rethink his stance on criminal justice!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After snagging an ultra-fuel-cell upgrade, the Ducky Boat suddenly becomes the fastest vehicle in Gotham. Later, confident leader Bam must rally the Batwheels to stop the turbo-Ducky!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Moxie Manatee hires The Looney Builders to build an obstacle course for the Sandy Shells Preschool Games, but Lola isnt listening to her crew.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwals new drone that he doesnt notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwals car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thiefs warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwals flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Beans Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own No Littering signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs come up with a new gadget, giving them the ability to take on the animals strength to take Lamput down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput and Specs find themselves on an island. Spec learns a harsh lesson on listening.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamputs been caught! The Docs dont have much to do now but to give tours to visiting students. Until one of these students, Tuzki specifically, gets lost. Will Tuzki find his way back to class? Not unless Lamput has something to do with it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Its hot out and when Grizzy sees an ice cream commercial on TV, he has a sudden craving. Unfortunately, the Lemmings made it to the deep-freeze in the garage before him and emptied it out to make themselves a sled run in the backyard with strawberry-vanilla ice cream. For Grizzy, theres no question that the stock they possessively watch over in an icebox winds up as powder snow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Quackers sleepwalking habit creates mischief and mayhem for Tom and Jerry during an overnight sleepover.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. Having been trapped with Tom its entire life, the shadow refuses to go back to the life it once had. But when the shadow becomes a total nuisance to Tom and Jerry, they team up to shed some light on the problem!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

Taking his new job seriously, Spike swears that nothing will happen to the baby. Naturally, this is where Tom and Jerry arrive on the scene to wreak havoc and make Spikes babysitting job quite possibly be his last!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When King Tut steals an ancient artifact that makes his Carcophagus magically fast, MOE equips Bam with rocket boosters to catch the villain and Bam must learn how to control all that speed.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwals new drone that he doesnt notice a car thief stealing his car. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwals flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Lamput

programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, its an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases ones sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy does his best to get rid of the Lemmings and enjoy some peace and quiet in the cabin, but each time they come back with a new and even more-disturbing activity. He locks himself up with them inside the garage, which has been transformed into an elementary school classroom. Grizzy is determined to make discipline reign but he has forgotten about the Lemmings natural penchant for bedlam.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

The rodents break out into Christmas carols and prepare a delicious snack for Grizzy before slipping out again. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

As he is about to take her in his arms, he is woken by the din of the Lemmings, who have chosen this particular day to blast music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. But first, hell have to stop the Lemmings fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine with a jewellery ad showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the rangers engagement ring to his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his temple, Grizzy is transformed into an exceptionally intelligent being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. With his way above average IQ, not only will he be able to provide himself with the latest high-tech comfort, getting rid of the Lemmings should be a piece of cake.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gleefully discovers that he can print images taken with the rangers camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. He decides to immortalize and frame himself

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A van pulls up to the rangers cabin to deliver a crate of jars of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Like usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter! The Lemmings have requisitioned the cabin for a party and barricaded themselves inside. Grizzy has no intention of waiting for an invitation to find a way to get in.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero Super Spy and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone in Mushton is finding that their precious wooden things are being munched and destroyed by someone or something.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: If Mush-Mush had Bollys speed, hed want everyone to see just how awesomely fast he was. But Bolly is different he just likes to use his speed helping Mushables. So when Mush-Mush organizes a big stunt for Bolly, he refuses. He just doesnt like to show off. But Mush-Mush promised everyone a show so a show he will give them with Mush-Mush performing instead of Bolly! Gulp!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep becomes obsessed with learning all about Mushlore -- all the funny little traditions and things that Mushables believe in.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Starmushs back is stuck, and the Mushelder has no choice but to ask for help in Mushton. Because Chep is the one that finds a solution to his back problem, Starmush chooses him to help with his daily activities. But Mush-Mush is jealous, he would have loved being the chosen one...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is so good at moss-marbles, no one wants to play him anymore! No one except Sumush who reveals himself to be a tough competitor. To Cheps disbelief, Sumush keeps on winning. But Lilit and Mush-Mush convince their friend not to give up. Chep decides to play his favourite moss-marble: the Rollinator. The one marble he never risked playing before...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To trick Grizzys vigilance and steal the TV, the Lemmings, disguised as traditional Chinese dancers, perform a number that leaves the bear flabbergasted. The rodents take advantage of their diversion to carry off the TV set on their airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas. But before they can escape with their bounty, Grizzy recovers the screen. Ever as determined, the Lemmings come back after upgrading their vessel.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But its not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Beans home eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they arent very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. When "Happy Birthday" rings out, the surpriiiiiise! is as great for Grizzy, who is trying to take a nap after a hearty meal, as it is for the birthday Lemming hero in question. From that point on, Grizzy has only one objective: stop the din, which is not at all helping his migraine headache. But for the Lemmings, the party must go on at any price.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzys adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. But the Lemmings, who are riding on the back of a bucking caribou, realize that the flower makes their mount sneeze, which only makes the game ten times more fun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American chest. They are communicating vessels, so if he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other, regardless of the distance between them. This should satisfy Grizzys natural lazy streak, unless the Lemmings realise the incredible games they could play with the magic vases.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by and it can even stop time and movement in ones surroundings. This will give him a sure advantage over the Lemmings, provided of course they dont get their hands on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his TV snack by a strange flow of incongruous objects that have been transformed into hot-air balloons. When he sees the Lemmings onboard these curious zeppelins, Grizzy understands that he will quickly have to confiscate their helium tank and balloons if he wants to relax in front of the TV.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers with great delight that the ranger has purchased a brand new multifunction Stressless recliner. But even an armchair designed for well-being - the ultimate in relaxation - can used for other purposes by the Lemmings, who transform it into a fearsome multi-game chair.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred wisselt van plek met Jeff, de tourgids in het geschiedenismuseum, zodat hij de gang kan helpen een mysterie op te lossen. Het mysterie: een angstaanjagende Egyptische krokodilgod terroriseert het museum. Het probleem: Fred is onmiddellijk jaloers op de nieuwe vent en wil het mysterie oplossen voordat Jeff de kans krijgt, met de hulp van de kinderen uit de tourgroep van Jeff.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De favoriete chef van Shaggy en Scooby opent eindelijk zijn eigen restaurant maar een monsterlijke yeti bedreigt de openingsavond. De gang moet het mysterie oplossen voordat het dessert wordt opgediend, terwijl Shaggy en Scooby de verleiding moeten weerstaan om al het eten op te eten dat voor de klanten bedoeld is!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast! But when the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbirds beach day plans, Bam helps him realize that even though things didnt go exactly as planned, they still had a great day!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a party boat for Mac and Tosh when Tweety accidentally makes a mistake but doesnt ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but its too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a date to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one thats perfect but is outraged when hes told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers hes one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find its closed!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. Now the locals are enraged, and the docs take the opportunity to stir up an angry mob to take down the creature and catch Lamput in the process! Not unless Lamputs new friend has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of Duplicate Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates cant be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
