Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemmings radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. But when Grizzy changes positions and his snoring stops, the Lemmings must find other sources of vibrations. Only these are no longer compatible with Grizzys nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. / Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. / Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom finds Butch taking a bath upstairs, he gives the alley cat the boot. Unfortunately, a ring around the tub isnt the only thing hes left behind. With the house now infested with fleas, Tom, Jerry and Spike declare war on the pesky little bloodsuckers.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After a particularly rough cat-and-mouse chase, Jerry quits! Tom is stunned as he watches his little friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave for another house. Its only days later as Jerrys gaining weight and a lonely Tom unsuccessfully looks to Spike for companionship and a new mouse-mate (named Mickey!) that they realize how much they need each other.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Spikes poker-playing pals go missing, he hires the cat and mouse detectives to find out where theyve gone.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom gets the hiccups, the witches decide that the only way to cure him is to scare him, so they banish him to the Wicked Forest of Very Scary Things. Unfortunately, there really isnt anything that frightening in, so they enlist Jerry to conjure up some scares a task that hes only too happy to oblige, by taking full advantage of the situation.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom takes a shot to the kisser that knocks the cat out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie bring home a magic ogres tooth.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Harley Quinns Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her. / A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom. Its up to MOE to stop the Zoomers with zany improvised tricks and traps with a little help from Ace and Batcomputer.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When a rich man writes Scooby into his will, the gang must spend a night in his creepy mansion with kooky relatives and a spooky phantom to collect Scoobys share.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy en Scooby ontdekken hun nieuwe lievelingseten wanneer de gang onderzoek doet naar het mysterie van een angstaanjagende voetballer die ronddwaalt in een snackfabriek!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but its too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Things go awry when Cates orders Tom to clean and inspect the family automobile. Tom, Jerry and Tuffy end up taking the car into the countryside and doing their best to control it. As Tom reads and attempts to follow the instruction manual, Jerry and Tuffy help, but they also suffer many near-misses.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch gets muscled out of his alley by a bullying runt of an alley cat and Tom, Jerry and Spike team up to help Butch win back his territory (and keep him out of theirs).

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry help a runaway champion horse become competitive again.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A magicians hat is left behind at Ginger and Ricks house. Jerry runs into it, but when Tom reaches in after him, all he gets are multiple magician props. Tyke and Spike soon join in, and the top hat continues to wreak havoc.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, a strange flying bug bites Tom, transforming him into a Tom-sized bug monster. Van Mouseling saves the village with an old-fashioned canister of bug poison, and Tom flies off to the abandoned castle on the hill. But Toms troubles arent over yet! Inside, he must deal with huge spider webs and a spider the size of a truck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the "sponge" turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estates new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger places her grannys old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as its sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cates appears and assigns Tom the job of sweeping the estates chimneys, warning him not to upset the Duchesss new exotic pet bird. Unfortunately, both the pet bird and a stork at the top of the chimney think Jerry is a worm. Soon chaos breaks out, hurting Toms cleaning efforts.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but its too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landladys vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that its rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to drive a mile in each others wheels in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signals one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids dance recital. / Its Tazs birthday, so The Looney Builders build him a huge ice cream sundae.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs tries to play music for the crew on their lunch break, but his boogie button is busted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play with poseable figurines of wild Canadian animals. When Grizzy sees that the bear figurine has been put inside a little cage, whereas those of the Lemmings are gathered around a mini-jar of chocolate spread, he decides to join in the party and take control of his own figurine.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a native American Indian vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true, if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. There is nonetheless one little snag: the effects of the genies magic instantly wear off as soon as he returns to his vase and the lid shuts.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While pursuing Lamput on a boat out at sea, Skinny is enchanted by the music of sirens who are taken by his singing. The sirens take a hypnotized Skinny away to their island where he is to sing for them or be a prisoner. Specs team up with Lamput to attempt a rescue.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. Hes thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. Hes so busy with matters of protocol he doesnt notice that the lady and her sinister butler arent quite what they seem...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guys making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar Ierland om het oude kasteel van de Blake-familie te bezoeken. Terwijl de gang onder de indruk raakt van het smaragden eiland, worden ze gedwongen te heroverwegen hoe geweldig de oude mythes en legendes daadwerkelijk zijn door een ontmoeting met een verwoestende reus.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang enters the heart of the American Gothic South in order to help an attractive farmer who Fred wants to impress with his mystery-solving prowess. A horrifying Scarecrow has come to life and attempts to drive everyone off his farm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Stinker, the trash-loving dog, comes by looking for help, Tom and Jerry arent inclined to take the case until they hear it involves a missing fortune. So, theyre disappointed when they find out Stinker is searching for a lost fortune cookie from his Chinese takeout to learn his fate. Retracing the dogs steps, they chase the fortune cookies trail through town.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After Tyke digs up, Hammy, Spikes lucky bone, Spike reburies it right away because its bad luck to remove it. Soon afterward, Tom gets a set of toy dog bones that do tricks, and he teases Spike and Tyke with them. When the whirly-bone buries itself and unearths Hammy for a second time, Spike recruits the other animals to help prevent the bad luck he expects.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger are asked to dog-sit for a friends French poodle, Sabrina, Tom is initially on his guard, but soon hes practically eating out of her hand. Next, Spike falls for Sabrina and does everything he can to impress her with how kind he is to Tom. How long will everyones behavior be affected by Sabrinas presence?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom, Jerry and Tuffy have a run-in with a moving suit of armor. The knight scares Tom away, but Jerry makes a brave stand because he thinks the knight is Tom in disguise. Jerry eventually trips the suit of armor and finds out its inhabited by three kittens. Relieved at first, the pets soon realize that battling one haunted knight is nothing compared to battling three real-life kittens.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerrys high-born cousin Count DaCaloriesa haughty city mousevisits the estate. At first, he acts sleek and refined, but soon he cant resist pigging out and going on multiple kitchen raids. As his paunch grows, it becomes more and more difficult for him to outrun Tom and stay out of sight of the Duchesss visitor.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, the peasant mice oompah band plays onstage at the auditorium. As the bandleaders lovely daughter, Gretta, hits a high note in her rousing song, Tomin a mask and hoodswings in on a rope and abducts her. Van Mouseling and the peasant band chase him through the rafters and backstage, but Tom escapes with his captive to a subterranean lair. Will the mice manage to free Gretta?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are starving for their reserves are depleted and their fishing has been unsuccessful. Fortunately, a truck delivers a crate of edibles to the research station that contains compact food cubes. When placed under a special light beam, the cubes retransform into delicious meals. Grizzy discovers that the decompressing lamp can, conversely, compact organic elements too. For example, the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings pace around the log cabin searching for virtual animals to capture with their tablet game. Annoyed by their behavior, Grizzy throws them outside. Determined to continue playing, the Lemmings trick the bear. But when the tablet hits the circuit breaker and explodes, the gaming animals come to life! Ice dinosaurs, laser caribous and giant carnivorous plants. The life-size hunt can begin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-loeil image. Furious, he flushes the Lemmings out of their hiding place where theyd hoped to watch their favorite cartoon in peace and propels them as far as possible. They land in an ancient cave where a powerful spirit capable of entering individuals is asleep. The Lemmings decide to free the spirit and send it to Grizzy. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzys TV. But it doesnt take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: its an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Rangers cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China, but the crew faces a major setback and Bugs worries about letting down his favourite chef.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critters arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders rush to build a soccer stadium in Mexico for their fast customer, Speedy Gonzalez. / As The Looney Builders help Petunia build a greenhouse, she cant wait for the veggies to grow and does everything she can to speed up the process.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Ma and Pa Bear to build a bedroom for their son, Junior, whose excitement causes setbacks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders help Wile E. Coyote build a telescope to view the Looney Moon, Tweety must face his fear of the dark. / The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museums famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Gothams annual dog show is tonight, and Harley plans to compete for the prized Best in Show ribbon. Sensing shes up to no good, Robin decides to enter rough-and-tumble Ace the Bat-Dog to keep an eye on the thieving trickster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird is convinced that nobody likes his eccentric dance moves, but when Toyman traps Robin behind a dance-themed gauntlet, its up to the rally car to dance his way to victory! / Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from stealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird is on the case in this radical music video as he sneaks and sleuths his way to stop Gothams villains with his speed and detective skills.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters. So they take her on a monster hunt and find more than they imagined.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to be brave enough to join in the daring games that Mush-Mush and Lilit like to play. So he gets some protective moss pants that make him not only indestructible but also fashionable and a bit cocky. Woo, its the new Chep!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush really wants to get over his fear of snakes. Truff really wants to get over his fear of ants. So they team up to help each other overcome their fears ... maybe.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpot offers to look after the Mushies so Mushpie can get a well-earned rest. He thinks it will be easy. It is not easy! The Mushies end up pushing both Mushpot and Starmush to their limit.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Sushi-Mushis excitement and pride over Chanterelle doing a portrait of him to hang in his restaurant turns to worry. What if his friends dont like it? But, of course, Chanterelle would never let that happen.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to show the Mushies that they should fly high and follow their dreams, Mushpie starts leaf-gliding for the first time.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off a Canadian army convoy. Inside, a case emits a sort of laser beam that divides objects into multiple miniaturized versions of themselves.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is very excited: tonight, a rare and extremely stinky plant is going to bloom! But he already promised Mush-Mush to play their favourite game. But when Mush-Mush realises that Chep is about to miss the blooming, he decides he wont let that happen and helps his friend!

programme.desc: Attorney William Conour helps desperate families recover money after serious injuries cost them dearly. His scam comes crashing down after he goes on a wild spending spree on an MTV reality show.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: As tourist numbers continue to rise worldwide, African wildlife parks are facing unprecedented challenges. In Kenyas iconic Masai Mara Reserve, the home of the Great Migration and one of the natural wonders of the world, the number of wildebeest migrating has dropped as tourist numbers have gone up. We take a look at the delicate balancing act required to ensure the preservation of the migration with evergrowing travel demands. Also: ranked one of Africas growing companies by the Financial Times in 2024, Hubtel originally began two decades ago as a messaging company in Ghana. Since then, its turned into an e-payments and commerce behemoth with 23 offices across Ghana. We spoke to CEO Alex Bram about the companys pivot towards fintech, growth strategy, and the importance of staying purely self funded within Ghana.

programme.title: Blowing Up History

programme.title: Blowing Up History

programme.title: How Do They Do It?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: On vuoden pisin paiva, ja Finias ja Ferb ottavat siita kaiken irti ja matkustavat maailman ympari yhdessa paivassa. Samana aikaan aiti ja isa lahtevat viikonloppumatkalle ja jattavat Candacen vastaamaan kodista. Han miettii, karayttaisiko veljensa vai lahtisiko heidan mukaansa Pariisiin tapaamaan Jeremya. Karaytys vai Jeremy? Han paattaa lahtea poikien mukaan todistaakseen, etta Jeremy yha pitaa hanesta. Matkan varrella Finiasin ikuinen optimismi joutuu koetukselle ja hanen on voitettava epailyksensa paastakseen kotiin ennen auringonlaskua.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: iti tekee neulontakoetta internetissa ja kaikkien pitaa olla mahdollisimman hiljaa, joten Finias ja Ferb kehittavat ninja-asuja, jotka katkevat kayttajansa kaikilta paitsi toisilta ninjoilta. Silla valin Tollontyosta tulee komea ja suosittu. / Baljeet saa viimeinkin tarpeekseen Bufordista ja paattaa kiiveta Danvillen vuoren huipulle... ilman keksintojen apua Finiaksen ja Ferbin jarkytykseksi. Silla valin Buford ryhtyy tohtori Tollontyon katyriksi, mutta kaipaa sisimmassaan omaa norttiaan.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb matkaavat Druselsteiniin, dunkelmarjojen kotimaahan, ja paatyvat sovittelijoiksi vuohien kulkusuuntaa koskevassa kriisissa. Silla valin Perry auttaa tohtori Tollontyota uusimaan ajokorttinsa ja Candace yrittaa selvittaa poikien katoavien keksintojen mysteeria tieteen keinoin. / Buford pukeutuu karhuksi auttaakseen ranskalaisia partiotyttoja hankkimaan ansiomerkin. Tilanne muuttuu monimutkaisemmaksi, kun kay ilmi, etta ollessaan Pariisissa Buford seurusteli yhden tytoista kanssa. Silla valin Perry yrittaa estaa tohtori Tollontyota pilaamasta Danvillen rinkeliviikkoja.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Timon ja Pumbaa
programme.desc: Kun Timon ja Pumba kaivavat kultaa Yukonissa, Timon loytaa pelkan pullonkorkin, kun taas Pumba loytaa kultakimpaleen, johon elefanttikin tukehtuisi. Timon on kateellinen Pumban tarkeasta asemasta menestyvana malminetsijana ja joutuu Kusko-Quintin manipuloinnin uhriksi. Timonilla ja Pumballa on erimielisyytta siita, auttaako surullista tiikeritarta, joka metsastaa ruokaa. Timonin mielesta petoelainta ei pitaisi auttaa, Pumban mielesta taas on tarkeaa auttaa hadassa olevia.

programme.title: Hamsteri And Kerttu
programme.desc: Tiedeprojekti menee monkaan. Koulu tekee naytelman.

programme.title: Hamsteri And Kerttu
programme.desc: Tiedeprojekti menee monkaan. Koulu tekee naytelman.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Sissemurdmised aratavad politseis kahtlust, et suudi on Pendlebury poistekooli pilane. Mike selgitab valja, et Tom on koolist pgenenud. Poissi jalitab ka el kasvataja, kes kardab, et Tom paljastab hirmsa saladuse. Aidensfield Armsis peatub noobel kulaline. Stanley Leroy kirjeldab oma hiilgavat lavakarjaari, kuid tegelikult on tal plaanis Bernie Scippsi abiga raha valja petta. Sue tuleb kulasse tagasi ja Ginas tarkab armukadedus.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: 1967. aastal valmistus Nukogude Eesti Kanadas toimuvaks maailmanaituseks. Spetsiaalselt selle tarvis valmis dokumentaalfilm "Vana Toomas kike teab", kus puuti Eesti elu vimalikult kaunilt ja pnevalt kujutada. Selleks, et ka Moskvas meie elust aru saadaks, on film venekeelne. Laulud on nneks eestikeelsed ja kuuluvad meie kullavaramusse. Saates ei ole kahjuks uhtki philist filmiloojat, sest aeg on paraku oma too teinud... Saatejuht Reet Linna, reissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mnusad kulalised. programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Reissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: "Maahommik" on kulas Kolotsi kitsetalus.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Markiis ei taha Curro aitamisest kuuldagi. Romulo teeb Lopele ettepaneku. Feliciano palub Teresa endale pruudiks. Jimena uritab teenijatelt infot hankida.

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Tauno otsustab ules otsida oma nooreplvearmastuse. Eevi ja Jarkko suhtesse tekib kriis. Severi tutvustab pangas oma geniaalset ariideed, et sellele rahastust saada. Taavi raagib tutrele lahutusest. Jani on teatrikooli tudengist sisse vetud.

programme.title: Rahvusvahelise muusikapaeva gala
programme.desc: Muusikapaeva galaga teeme kummarduse Eesti heliloojate loomingule. Paev tais muusikat kulmineerub Viimsi Artiumis toimuva piduliku galaga, kus uhtlasi selguvad Eesti Muusikanukogu ja Eesti Kultuurkapitali helikunsti sihtkapitali tanavused muusikapreemiate laureaadid. Muusikapaeva gala kunstiline juht on Rasmus Puur ja lavastaja Veiko Tubin. Lavalaudadele astuvad Eesti esinduskollektiivid ja solistid, teiste hulgas Marcel Johannes Kits, Ain Anger, Tallinna Kammerorkester, Eesti Rahvusmeeskoor ja Hortus Musicus. Teleulekande reissoor Elo Selirand, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja reissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa. Tana on Arvo Pardil 90. sunnipaev. Palju nne!

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Kui Danny Reece toibub autoavariist, avastab ta, et kadunud on kohvritais raha. Sellest paevast peale hakkavad kohalikud vaesed saama anonuumseid rahaumbrikke. Keegi mangib Reecei rahaga Robin Hoodi. Bernie Scripps satub kahtluse alla. Graham teeb Maggiele ahvatleva ettepaneku. Ventress aitab Bellamyl Ginale unustamatu sunnipaeva korraldada.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Laine kahtlustab, et Kristjanil on armuke. lo tahab Almaga labiraakimisi pidada. Mare kutsub Ahvenat oma metsavaldusi ule vaatama. Jaanus otsustab oma saatuse ule. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Esimene stuudio
programme.desc: Saatesari avab erinevaid paevakajalisi teemasid, mis sunnivad meie igapaeva-elust, alates poliitikast ja majandusest, lpetades sotsiaalia ning kultuuriga. Saatejuhid Andres Kuusk, Johannes Tralla, Mirko Ojakivi. Reissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: TeadusEST
programme.desc: Kas inimesi on tootmises robotite keskele enam vaja? Toostuse tugevuseks on kiired, tugevad ja ka uha enam arukad masinad. Tehisaru vimalused on kaivitamas toostusrevolutsiooni viiendat lainet. Inimese roll tootmisahelas on igal juhul muutumas. "TeadusEST" piilub nii tarka tootmist arendavates laborites kihavasse leiutajatoosse kui ka tootmisuksustesse, kus tulevik on juba kohal. Saatejuht-toimetaja Kristjan Pihl, toimetaja Kertu Loide, reissoor Liis Lindmaa, produtsent Anatoli Tafituk, tootja Ulm Production. Saade valmib koostoos Eesti Teadusagentuuriga.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy
programme.desc: Stanley Tucci tutvub viimastel aastatel kulinaariamekaks saanud Milanoga. Itaalia suurima moedunastia liikmed pakuvad Stanleyle oma lemmikroogasid, Alpides kohtub ta juustutegijaga ja puuab Como jarvel kala.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: "Pealtnagija" on Eesti pikima ajalooga ja teletabelite tipus olev uuriv ajakirjandussaade, mis toob vaatajateni pnevad ja paljastavad lood meie uhiskonna telgitagustest. Lisaks teravatele uurimustele vahendab saade ka haaravaid persoone ja meeldejaavaid reportaae sundmustest, mille pealtnagijaks tavaline inimene naljalt ei satu. Saatejuhid Mihkel Karmas, Kristjan Pihl, Merilin Parli, Taavi Eilat ja Margit Kilumets. Reissoorid Raivo Maripuu ja Vladlen Pobjarin, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: Heites pilgu moodalainud aastakumnetesse, markame, et noortemuusikal on olnud oma ajastu pitser ja omad lemmikud. "Oi aegu..." raakis just sellest. Malestusi oma noorusest meenutasid Artur Rinne, Voldemar Porosaar ja kunagine muusikapoe muuja Voldemar Gerst. Osalesid Jaan Arder, Kuldne Trio, Maie Tnso, Olav Ehala, Laine-trio ja paljud Tallinna teatrite naitlejad, lavastasid Eero Spriit ja Toomas Lepp. Kas tuleb tuttav ette? Toimetaja Reet Linna, reissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: Mullist valja
programme.desc: Anastassia ja Grigori saavad varahommikul karmi vapustuse osaliseks - nad on Venemaa sjakuriteo tunnistajaks. Saates osalejad saavad vaga hasti aru, et roimar on Venemaa. Kas see kurb hommik vib muuta dokumentaalsarjas osalejate maailmapilti?

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Margarita hoiatab Catalinat abielu eest. Markiis uritab Jimenat aidata. Mauro jagab markiiga oma muret Romulo parast. Jana tahab Abeliga suhte lpetada.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Tstamaal asub kinokelder, kus elavaks eksponaadiks ja giidiks on Helireissoor Jaak Elling. Tema on labi krvaklappide kuulnud paljude dokumentaalfilmide sundi. Oma meenutused kaasteelistest ja petussnad tulevastele plvedele annab ta edasi Reet Linna abiga.

programme.title: he pere muusika
programme.desc: Laulev naitleja Andres Ots ja poeg Aleksander, kes tuntud telest Sannu ning Punkri tegelasena, samuti ansambliga "Koomes", seavad Saaremaal Gotlandi suvekodu uel puuriita ja raagivad elust ning muusikast. Oktoobris tahistab Andres Ots oma 80. sunnipaeva. Saatejuht Reet Linna, reissoor Maarika Lauri , toimetaja Marika Kaasik, produtsent Andrs Arro.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Rahamured varjutavad Aidensfieldi puhademeeleolu. Pangajuhataja Gordon Stringeri kitsidus annab tagasiloogi ja toob talle endale juluhtul kurvastust. Greengrass satub jarjekordse kelmuse tttu politseikongi. Bellamy suurim mure on Ginale sobiva kingituse otsimine.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Pder kohtub Mornas taas kauni tundmatuga. lo avastab, et ei maleta viimastest paevadest midagi. Pille tookaaslane Reet otsib raadio kaudu noormehi, kellega koos veidi lbutseda. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Kigil pereliikmetel tekib oma suhe alastuse ja kehakuvandiga: Eevi on hadas poolkogemata filmitud seksivideoga, Tauno otsustab minna aktimodelliks ja Jani uritab urii liikme voodi kaudu Jussi-auhinda vita. Severi tutvustab tootukassas uut ideed, milleks on rahvusvahelise keele loomine.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Jimena uritab Manuelile laheneda. La Promesasse saabub don Pelayo toapoiss. Lope sidab Madridi. Romulo kukub kokku.

programme.title: Muusikast Mihkel Rauaga
programme.desc: Teeme ekskursi popmuusika visuaalsetele radadele ja tuletame meelde meie kige agedamaid muusikavideoid. Kui palju aega ja raha on praegused artistid valmis kulutama, et nende muusikat saadaks age visuaal? Mihkel Raua vestluskaaslasteks sel teemal on Karl-Erik Taukar, Jaagup Kreem, EIK, Genka, Kohver ja Korea, Yasmyn, Karl Killing, Tanel Padar, Robert Parelo, Masa, Marta Vaarik, Juri Pihel, Raivo Suviste, Renee Meriste, Sandra Sersant, Alar Kotkas, Auris Ratsep jt.

programme.title: Karen Pirie
programme.desc: Mida kaugemale Karen oma uurimisega juab, seda selgemaks saab, et Cat pidi olema ise oma rooviga seotud. Nuud otsitakse roovlite jalgi juba valismaalt, kuid Cati isa tahab politsei uurimise lpetada.

programme.title: Varvimuusika
programme.desc: Pinge kruvib! Kelle muusikaalased teadmised on paremad, kas Trafficu vi Estonian Voicesi? See selgub sellenadalases ulipnevas "Varvimuusika saates. Kusimusi esitab ja punkte jagab saatejuht Reigo Ahven.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Queen of Fucking Everything
programme.desc: Koistinen on kadunud, Borje endast valjas ja Linda udusunenaod lahevad aina hullemaks. Tema kentsakas remondibrigaad hakkab toole vanas kogudusemajas. Tahtes Queen of Homesi tegevust laiendada, veenab Linda nii linnaplaneerimisametit kui ka koguduse juhatuse esinaist oma plaani toetama. Aga kui Spora ahvardab Linda saladuse paljastada, peab ta leidma viisi tema vaigistamiseks.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Rahamured varjutavad Aidensfieldi puhademeeleolu. Pangajuhataja Gordon Stringeri kitsidus annab tagasiloogi ja toob talle endale juluhtul kurvastust. Greengrass satub jarjekordse kelmuse tttu politseikongi. Bellamy suurim mure on Ginale sobiva kingituse otsimine.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: 1981. aastal tutvus Eesti rahvas Pakapikula rahvaga. Kuna juba aastakumneid polnud paljud sellest eksootilisest maast kuulnudki, oli meie publiku vastuvtt aaretult soe ja tanulik. Pakapikud tulid, et jaada. Pakapikkude tegemisi ning muresid meenutavad lastekirjanik ja teletoimetaja Ene-Maris Tali, kelmikate laulusnade autor Priit Aimla ning mitmed pakapikud. Saatejuht Reet Linna, reissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: Chopped

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon makes pastrami spiced pork chops with braised vegetables and tops devilled eggs with pickled mustard seeds and chives.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon prepares fluke Milanese and keeps things fresh with a shaved courgette salad. Liz tops it all off with a lemon drop martini.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Actress, and comedian Aisha Tyler and Katie Lee Biegel ply Bobby Flay with cocktails while Jeff Potts and Brittney Williams toast their path to victory.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: The Views Sunny Hostin and Christian Petroni rock Bobby Flay with a Kati roll challenge. Chefs Romain Paumier and Avishar Barua roll up to the kitchen.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: The Human Ice Pop and sideshow sword swallower inspire the bakers to create treats that melt and a dessert swallowed by another dessert.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four chefs create coastal cuisine from Puglia, but one competitors mistake causes a big stink in the kitchen - literally.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon prepares smoked pork butt for pulled pork sandwiches along with crispy fried courgette chips with parmesan.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon is ready to celebrate Dad with a twist on Texas chilli, sweet and savoury cornbread, and some chocolatey, nutty dessert bars.

programme.desc: Molly Yeh shares simple recipes to make life a little less complicated. She makes her Midwestern oatmeal cookie salads and a fluffy harissa potato chip frittata.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship

programme.title: Kiinteistokaupoilla rahoiksi
programme.desc: Jokaisessa jaksossa seurataan kahta henkiloa, jotka pyrkivat asuntomarkkinoille. He ostavat huonokuntoisia kohteita ja muokkaavat niista upeita, ostajia houkuttelevia asuntoja. Innokkailla tekijoilla on jonkin verran taitoja, mutta sitakin suurempi halu tehda voittoa kauppaamalla remontoidut kohteet eteenpain. Ensimmaisessa jaksossa seurataan Abbyn ja Mattin matkaa.

programme.title: Remonttipari
programme.desc: Chip ja Joanna Gaines pyorittavat Wacossa, Teksasissa talojen uudistamiseen ja sisustamiseen erikoistunutta Magnolia Homes-yritystaan. Sarjassa seurataan, kuinka rakentamisesta vastaava Chip ja sisustamiseen keskittyva Joanna muokkaavat rapistuneita, mutta runsaasti potentiaalia omaavia taloja edustuskuntoon. Samalla kohenee koko asuinalueen ilme.

programme.title: Mentalisti
programme.desc: The CBI pursues two lines of investigation when a Santa is murdered: Patrick Jane goes undercover in an AA group; and Rigsby and Van Pelt question members of an authentic Santa society. Meanwhile, following the demise of a person in custody at the CBI, J.J. LaRoche is brought in to question the team when it appears to be an inside job.

programme.desc: Hammaslaakari valitsee hammaspeikon, joka ei voi istua pariseremoniassa mutta pystyy heittamaan kapuloita muiden rattaisiin. Tunnemyrskyiltakaan ei valtyta.

programme.title: My King Charles
programme.desc: Uunituore dokumentti valottaa kuningas Charles III:n elamaa nuoruusvuosista alkaen aina valtaistuimelle nousuun saakka. Kuulemme, miten prinssi Charlesia kohdeltiin koulussa, tutustumme hanen nuoruutensa tyttoystaviin seka opimme ehka jotakin uutta katastrofaalisesti paattyneesta avioliitosta prinsessa Dianan kanssa. Myos kaikkein uusimmat kuninkaallista perhetta riepottelevat skandaalit Harrysta ja Meghanista prinssi perataan lapi.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Kausi 7. Jakso 5/10. Helpompi piha. Hienoissa koskimaisemissa sijaitsevan jylhan mokin omistajilla on hieman erikoisia toiveita. Aikaisempien omistajien hyvin hoidettu piha onjaanyt heitteille ja nyt siita halutaan helppohoitoisempi ja -kulkuisempi. Erikoistoiveet liittyvat kuitenkin perheen lapsiin, joista yksi tarvitsee apua vaikeakulkuisella pihalla. (41) Ohjelmatekstitys.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 27/36. Hammasrivi kuntoon. Hammasrivi saa lopullisen muotonsa, kun hammaspeikot ja hammaslaakari tekevat osuutensa. Ennen pariseremoniaa odottaa kuitenkin viela yksi yllatys. Ruotsalainen realitysarja.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Hammaslaakari saa tehtavakseen harjata toisen hammaspeikoista pois, ja jaljelle jaanyt peikko saa koskemattomuuden pariseremoniaan. Putoamisvaarassa olevien kilpailijoiden hyvaksi laaditaan luovia suunnitelmia, ja illan paatteeksi yksi kilpailijoista joutuu paattamaan, kuunnellako sydantaan vai paataan.

programme.title: Maryn helpot kokkailut
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 3/25. Yhden astian ihmeet. Mary esittelee aterioita, jotka valmistuvat katevasti yhdessa astiassa. Han valmistaa ihania kirsikkaleivonnaisia, maistuvaa porsaspataa siiderin kera, peltiturskaa ja mausteista intialaista dahlia. Parasta on se, ettei kokkauksen jalkeen tarvitse huolehtia tiskivuoresta! Kanadalainen ruokareality.

programme.title: 100 Places to Be
programme.desc: Mihin julkkikset matkustavat, kun he haluavat rentoutua ja karata paparazzeilta? Dokumentti esittelee 100 toistaan upeampaa lomakohdetta ympari maailmaa. Dokumenttisarja.

programme.title: 100 Places to Be
programme.desc: Mihin julkkikset matkustavat, kun he haluavat rentoutua ja karata paparazzeilta? Dokumentti esittelee 100 toistaan upeampaa lomakohdetta ympari maailmaa. Dokumenttisarja.

programme.title: Suomi Soi
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 2/6. Suomi Soi ja megahitit! Olavi Uusivirta tulkitsee suomeksi Robbie Williamsin Feel -kappaleen ja Jonna Tervomaa Cranberriesin Zombie-hitin. Mutta mita pakahduttavan romanttista tapahtui, kun Jonna Tervomaa tapasi amerikkalaisen muusikkokollegansa ensimmaista kertaa? Jaksossa selviaa myos, minka kulkupelin kyytiin Mira Luoti paasi nuorena Loimaalla ja mita muita muistoja liittyy Haddawayn What Is Love -kappaleeseen, jonka han versioi suomeksi. Kotimainen musiikkiohjelma.

programme.title: IS esittaa: Sain sen videolle
programme.desc: Kausi 4. Jakso 7/19. Ilta-Sanomat julkaisee kymmenia lukijoiden kuvaamia videoita kuukaudessa. Suomalaisen luonnon ihmeet, sattumukset liikenteessa ja arjen erikoiset tilanteet paatyvat usein videolle. Sain sen videolle -ohjelmassa nahdaan valittuja paloja IS:n lukijoiden kuvaamista videoista.

programme.title: Amazing Race Suomi
programme.desc: Kausi 2. Jakso 4/12. Super-etapin toinen osuus koettelee tiimien fyysisia voimia ja psyyken kestavyytta. Paivalla hermoja koetellaan linnoituksen uumenissa ja illalla kilpailu huipentuu puiston hamaraan, jossa viimeiset tiimit kamppailevat jatkopaikasta erikoisissa olosuhteissa. Ohjelman juontaa: Heikki Paasonen Kotimainen realitysarja. (74) Ohjelmatekstitys.

programme.title: Tulossa: Elisa Viihde -alkuperaissarja Jaan vangit 3.10. alkaen (16)
programme.desc: Tulossa Nelonen Median kanavilla. Kotimainen ohjelma.

programme.title: NCIS Rikostutkijat
programme.desc: Kausi 22. Jakso 20/20. Lampiman huumorin savyttamassa rikosdraamasarjassa seurataan Yhdysvaltain laivaston erikoisyksikkoa, jonka tehtavana on selvittaa eri puolilla maailmaa rikoksia, jotka tavalla tai toisella liittyvat Yhdysvaltain laivastoon tai merijalkavakeen. Taitavaa ja monipuolista tiimia johtaa Mark Harmonin esittama agentti Gibbs. Paaosissa ovat: Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Pauley Perrette ja Sean Murray. Amerikkalainen rikosdraamasarja.

programme.title: Farmi Suomi
programme.desc: Uusi torppari nostattaa hiljaisten valtakauden aiemmin niin meluisalle maatilalle. Farmille on piilotettu kultainen porkkana, ja tieto tasta kaynnistaa ennennakemattoman porkkanajahdin. Kaikessa hiljaisuudessa torpparinhuoneesta on salakuljetettu herkkuja ulos ja siita ei selvita sanktioitta. Kaksintaistelussa nahdaan ripaus taikauskoa, ja tiukan taiston paatteeksi yksi farmilainen poistuu joukosta.

programme.title: Kanadan rajalla
programme.desc: Kausi 2. Jakso 21/26. Matkamuistoja Romaniasta. Romaniasta saapuvan pariskunnan matkatavaroista loytyy lihaisia yllatyksia. Amerikkalainen bussimatkustaja taas saa tunnustaa Kanadan rajalla vanhat rikoksensa. Kanadalainen realitysarja.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 27/36. Hammasrivi kuntoon. Hammasrivi saa lopullisen muotonsa, kun hammaspeikot ja hammaslaakari tekevat osuutensa. Ennen pariseremoniaa odottaa kuitenkin viela yksi yllatys. Ruotsalainen realitysarja.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Hammaslaakari saa tehtavakseen harjata toisen hammaspeikoista pois, ja jaljelle jaanyt peikko saa koskemattomuuden pariseremoniaan. Putoamisvaarassa olevien kilpailijoiden hyvaksi laaditaan luovia suunnitelmia, ja illan paatteeksi yksi kilpailijoista joutuu paattamaan, kuunnellako sydantaan vai paataan.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Mokin kunnostus historiaa kunnioittaen. Mikon ja Villen apua tarvitaan saaressa. Upeilla nakymilla varustetun mokin omistajat, Pia ja Mikko, haluaisivat paivittaa Pian isan suunnitteleman mokin nykyaikaan sen historiaa kunnioittaen. Hulppean kokoiseen rakennukseen tehdaan moderni keittio ja makuuhuone muutetaan jarkevammaksi. Remontti ei kuitenkaan suju taysin ongelmitta, silla 60-luvulla rakennetun mokin uumenista paljastuu yllattavia

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Kangasalalla tehdaan pirunpellosta piha. Paikan nykyiset omistajat, Kalle ja Heikki, ovat energinen pariskunta jonka toiveissa on tehda suvun mokkipihasta heidan nakoisensa. Tahan toiveeseen sisaltyy myos uusi kesakeittio, laituri ja enemman oleskelutilaa. Matka valmiiseen lopputulokseen on pitka ja kivinen, mutta siita muodostuu yksi Evan ja Nikon uran hienoimmista.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Jakson perhetta ahdistaa saunamokki, joka on ihastuttavasti jarven rannalla, mutta uhkaavasti kallellaan. Mokin suoristamisen lisaksi haasteena on toteuttaa Tinnan toive rantahuvilamaisesta tunnelmasta. Kylassa osiossa Eva kay tutustumassa 7. kaudella remontoituun pihaan. Eva tuo mukanaan puutarhurinsa, jotta pihan kasvit saadaan kuntoon.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Kausi 7. Jakso 5/10. Helpompi piha. Hienoissa koskimaisemissa sijaitsevan jylhan mokin omistajilla on hieman erikoisia toiveita. Aikaisempien omistajien hyvin hoidettu piha onjaanyt heitteille ja nyt siita halutaan helppohoitoisempi ja -kulkuisempi. Erikoistoiveet liittyvat kuitenkin perheen lapsiin, joista yksi tarvitsee apua vaikeakulkuisella pihalla. (41) Ohjelmatekstitys.

programme.title: Korkeasaari
programme.desc: Persianlammas Papana muuttaa pois Korkeasaaresta. Papanan lastauksen toivotaan etenevan aikataulussa, silla saaresta ulos johtava silta suljetaan uuden sisaankaynnin peruskiven muurausta varten. Uuden rakennuksen uumeniin muurataan aikakapseli, mutta mita se sisaltaa? Lisaksi tiikerit saavat jattikurpitsan ja ahmoille asennetaan uudet pesakamerat.

programme.title: Korkeasaari
programme.desc: Radio Rockin Korporaatio vierailee saaressa ja tekee tuttavuutta mm. kissaelainten, kameleiden seka visenttien kanssa. Lisaksi tavataan julkisuudestakin tuttu Pedro-kaarme, joka kay puntarilla. Talvi on saapumassa saareen ja karhut alkavat vetaytya talvipesaansa. Villielainsairaalassa kasvaneet joutsenet paasevat takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Rekkakuskit Suomi
programme.desc: Uusi jakso! Tummat pilvet keraantyvat seka Pirkkalassa Kirsin etta Kangasniemella Anni-Riinan ylle - uhkaako tyopaiva keskeytya yllattaviin vikoihin? Yka ja Johanna hyppaavat Enonkoskella molemmat ratin taakse ja lahtevat yhdessa tuplalannoitekuorman ajoon leveille maanteille, kun taas Tammisaaressa Fredrik kay keraamassa tukkikuormansa kapean mokkitien varrelta.

programme.title: Rekkakuskit Suomi
programme.desc: Hikikarpaloita ja hyonteistorjuntaa. Uusi jakso! Jannen maitoauton matka alkaa Temmeksella jo aamukahdelta, kun taas Voyrilla Niclas on saanut nukkua muutaman tunnin pidempaan ennen kuin suuntaa puukuormien ajoon seka hyonteistorjuntatehtaviin. Anni-Riinan tyopaiva soljuu sekalaisen sellukuorman kanssa kohti Lappeenrantaa, kun taas Juhon tyopaivaan tulee yllatysajokeikka.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Erinin todistaja ei saavu oikeuteen, ja hanen etsintansa uhkaa paattya traagisesti. Frank huomaa menettaneensa otteen kaupunkilaisiin. Jackilla on ehdotus Erinin kampanjaan.

programme.title: Farmi Suomi
programme.desc: Sopimuksia rikotaan ja nimeamisessa tapahtuu kaikkien aikojen peliliike, joka saa farmilaiset ajattelemaan taysin uudella tavalla. Sita niittaa, mita kylvaa: monien suunnitelmat valuvat hiekkaan, silla kaksintaistelussa tapahtuu yllattava kaanne, joka ei kaikkia miellyta.

programme.title: Kanadan rajalla
programme.desc: Amerikkalaismies saapuu Kanadaan tapaamaan nettityttoystavaansa, mutta vanhat tuomiot asettavat esteita. Brittimiehen avioliittosotkut taas herattavat epailyksia maahantulon tarkoituksesta.

programme.title: Amazing Race Suomi
programme.desc: Kausi 2. Jakso 1/12. Kilpailu voittopotista alkaa. Yksitoista tiimia lahtee matkaan aamuvarhaisella ja ensimmaisena tehtavana on selvittaa vihjeiden avulla seuraava maaranpaa. Toisilta tehtava sujuu leikiten ja osa tiimeista jaa auttamatta tuskailemaan oikean vastauksen kanssa. Ohjelman juontaa Heikki Paasonen. Kotimainen realitysarja. (99) Ohjelmatekstitys.

programme.title: Shalom over Israel - Israel 70 r
programme.desc: Hur man vittnar for judiska israeler. Talare Moti Vaknin (frn One for Israel).

programme.title: Pilgrim - Elida till Israel 2023
programme.desc: Avseglingfest i Hono hamn. 19 augusti bjod Elida in till fest i Hono hamn infor seglatsen till Israel. Njut av all musik och lyssna till bland annat Hans Weichbrodt, Roland Utbult, Philip Holmberg och kapten Stefan Abrahamsson.

programme.title: Nya Testamentet oppnas
programme.desc: Romarbrevet 1/2. Varfor skrev Paulus den tidens langsta brev till en forsamling han aldrig traffat? Pawson synar olika synsatt. r kapitlen 9 11 bara en parentes eller nyckeln till hela brevet? Lyssna och avgor.

programme.title: LUMO - Matteusevangeliet
programme.desc: Matteus 21:12-46. Dramatisering av evangelietexten p svenska. Jesus i templet. Jesus forbannar fikontradet. Jesu fullmakt ifrgasatts. Liknelsen om de bda sonerna. Liknelsen om de onda vinodlarna.

programme.title: Rakt p sak med Ingemar Helmner
programme.desc: Verklig folkkyrka. Ingemar Helmner beskriver den idealiska forsamlingen - den som forenar folkkyrka med vackelsekyrka. Dar kyrkan inte ar en stelnad forening utan en oppen spontan famn som alltid predikar fralsning.

programme.title: Bibelstudie med Baruch Korman
programme.desc: Folket hotas med undergng. Baruch Korman undervisar frn Hos 5:1-12 om Guds vrede over otuktsanden i nordriket Israels kungar och sydriket Juda, som flyttar gransmarkeringar och frivilligt foljer manniskobud.

programme.title: Kungen kommer
programme.desc: Alijah, judarna tervander. Vad sa Herren om Israels tervandande till landet Israel for mer an 3300 r sedan? Kenneth Witick utlagger frn 5 Mos 30 och samtalar med Robert Adams och Daniela Persin.

programme.title: Give Peace a Chance
programme.desc: Finns det lagliga grunder for staten Israel? Vad hande i San Remo och vilken betydelse har det idag? Ge freden en chans, uppmanar Europeiska Koalitionen for Israel.

programme.title: Gast hos Martti
programme.desc: Gast ar Aki Kangasmaki. Del 1/2. Aki motte Jesus 7 r gammal d han var nara att do. En dag gav Gud honom i uppdrag att ka hem till backhopparen Matti Nykanen. Martti Ojares ar programvard.

programme.title: Israel talar
programme.desc: Folken mots till fest i Jerusalem. Hostens hogtider samlar ocks kristna i Jerusalem. Bonekonferensen for alla folk mots mellan Rosh Hashana och Jom Kippur och vi ser glimtar frn lovhyddohogtiden. Gershon Nerel berattar om kung David.

programme.title: LUMO - Johannesevangeliet
programme.desc: Johannes 10:1-42. Dramatisering av evangelietexten p svenska. Den gode herden. Jesu enhet med Fadern.

programme.title: Gershon Nerels Israel
programme.desc: Jude och grek. Del 2/2. Paulus undervisning om jude och grek. Israel i Guds plan.

programme.title: Letters
programme.desc: Det man ber om, det kan man f. I dag ar Helena Lindfors en trygg tjej som leder andra. Ngra r tidigare hade hon suttit fast i en tillvaro av droger, polisingripanden och ungdomsanstalter.

programme.title: Cafe Bibeln Uppsala
programme.desc: Varfor behover den kristna tron forklaras och forsvaras. Leif Nummela samtalar med Stefan Gustavsson, den mest kanda apologeten i Norden, utifrn hans bok. En apologet forsvarar och forklarar tron.

programme.title: Shalom over Israel - Israel 70 r
programme.desc: Hur man vittnar for judiska israeler. Talare Moti Vaknin (frn One for Israel).

programme.title: Kungadomets vind
programme.desc: Folken i Fjarran ostern p vag mot Jerusalem. Varldshistoriens andra halvlek borjade p Salomonoarna och nu ar folken i Fjarran ostern p vag mot Jerusalem langs den banade vagen som profeterats i Jes 62. Bonehusen har en speciell uppgift i att bygga banade vagar till Jerusalem.

programme.title: Husforsamlingar - aktivt larjungaskap
programme.desc: Familjens betydelse. Familjen ar grunden for husforsamlingar, hemmet ar den naturliga samlingsplatsen och barnen ar foraldrarnas forsta larjungar. I husforsamlingar samlas generationerna tillsammans, de separeras inte.

programme.title: I framsatet
programme.desc: Mary Jarnmark p jakt efter bekraftelse. Mary vaxte upp i en kristen miljo och upplevde Guds kraft som barn, men ett starkt bekraftelsebehov drev henne bort frn kyrkan och till gangen och drogerna. Men Jesus slutade aldrig soka henne.

programme.title: Jerusalemnytt med Sartola
programme.desc: Tisdag 30/9 2025. Palestina erkandes i FN.Inget Palestina, forsakrade daremot Netanjahu.Nyr i Israel.

programme.title: Stress, press och vila
programme.desc: Individuell stress. Viljan att prestera ar en drivkraft som kan fora oss i bde bra och dliga riktningar. P vilket satt pverkar detta vr omgivning? Och mitt i allt detta, hur kan vi finna vila i Gud?

programme.title: Ursprung
programme.desc: Bikaka. Goran Schmidt talar om bikakans uppbyggnad frn ett skapelseperpektiv

programme.title: Guldkorn - Tillsammans ber vi
programme.desc: Vad Gud har fogat samman. Andreas Skogvard - ur Tillsammans ber vi LIVE avsnitt 90. Startpunkten for att uppratta en brusten relation ar att rannsaka ditt hjarta och din relation med Gud - den pverkar alla andra relationer.

programme.title: Derek Prince
programme.desc: Forsamlingen i skakningarna 2/3. Tema: Nar Gud skakar allt. Derek Prince fortsatter sin predikan, nu om profeten Jonas kallelse och provning, om vikten av tlamod, uthllighet och stndaktighet samt om apostelns och profetens ambete.

programme.title: Vetlanda Friforsamling - Vackelsemote
programme.desc: Guds folks kallelse till renhet - Del 1. Predikan med Olof Edsinger. Renhet ar ett ord som hller p att dras i smutsen i dagens samhalle, men Bibeln kraver renhet av oss. Vad sager Bibeln om renhet och hur ska vi relatera till renhet idag?

programme.title: Israel talar
programme.desc: Guds hjalp under Jom Kippur-kriget. r 1973, mitt under stillheten under Jom Kippur, utbrot det hrdaste kriget i den israeliska statens historia. Arie Bar David ar en p Jesus troende jude som d kriget brot ut var en 26-rig officer i reserven.

programme.title: Salaam Aleikum
programme.desc: Forsoningsdagens utbyte. Forsoningsdagen, Jom kippur, forutsager det ultimata och perfekta utbyte som Gud erbjuder.

programme.title: Mer an naturligt
programme.desc: Oerhort forunderligt. Det har ar battre an sjukhuset!, sager den aldre damen d teamet har bett for hennes sjukdomar.

programme.title: Parforhllande
programme.desc: Svrigheten att forlta. Varken Ritas eller Afas behov blev tillgodosedda i aktenskapet. Afa upplevde att han fick mer berom och acceptans utanfor familjen. Rita kampade for att kunna forlta honom och terforena familjen.

programme.title: Ordets parlor
programme.desc: Narhet. I aktenskapet och forsamlingen finns mycket som ar lika. Miisu Piipari undervisar och forklarar.

programme.desc: Folken i Fjarran ostern p vag mot Jerusalem. Varldshistoriens andra halvlek borjade p Salomonoarna och nu ar folken i Fjarran ostern p vag mot Jerusalem langs den banade vagen som profeterats i Jes 62. Bonehusen har en speciell uppgift i att bygga banade vagar till Jerusalem.

programme.title: Ordets parlor
programme.desc: Narhet. I aktenskapet och forsamlingen finns mycket som ar lika. Miisu Piipari undervisar och forklarar.

programme.title: Israel talar
programme.desc: Bibelns betydelse for israelerna. Judarna kallar Bibeln Bockernas bok. Vi utreder hur viktig Bockernas bok ar for israeler i dag.

programme.title: Det ar overnaturligt!
programme.desc: Gast ar Daniel Kolenda. Daniel Koleda ar attling till pingspastorer i fem led. Gud uppvackte hans farfarsfar frn doden. Nu ar Daniel evangelist och arbetar tillsammans med Reinhard Bonnke.

programme.title: Att hora Guds rost
programme.desc: Gud talar genom Anden i dig. Elia sg en storm, en jordbavning och en eldsvda men Gud var inte i ngon av dem. Sedan kom en svag susning. r det s nar Gud talar genom den Helige Ande? Med Andreas Hager och Louise Gustafsson.

programme.title: Boneskola
programme.desc: Nycklar till att f bonesvar. Jehova Mekadesh - Herren som helgar. En av nycklarna till bonesvar ar att tro att det ar dig givet (Mark 11:24). Att ta emot bonesvar och avsloja hinder for bonesvar som oforsonlighet i ditt liv.

programme.title: Cafe Bibeln Uppsala
programme.desc: Min vag till kristet ledarskap. P en tgresa i ungdomen sg han en vision: en mur genom vilken ett varmt ljus strommade, fyllt av karlek. En frga uppstod: Finns Gud? Mats-Jan Soderberg talar med Leif Nummela om sin tro och tjanst.

programme.title: Pilgrim Media
programme.desc: Konsten att inte bli forledd. Ove Marcelind undervisar om en kristens viktigaste strategier for att inte bli forledd i denna tid. Kan man anvanda sig av AI for att skriva sina predikningar? Hur kanner man igen en profet?

programme.title: John Fenn - ABC for husforsamlingar
programme.desc: Husforsamling i Nya Testamentet 4/4. John Fenn visar med bas i Bibeln hur du kan starta en husforsamling.

programme.title: Trons grunder med ke Carlson
programme.desc: Hur vi fr evigt liv. Nar manniskan syndade forlorade hon Guds harlighet och sin slutdestination. Men Gud bojde sig ner och erbjod en ny chans att komma ratt - och f evigt liv genom Jesus Kristus.

programme.title: Letters
programme.desc: I serien Letters fr vi i en kreativ brevform av ljud och bild ta del av ett antal manniskors personliga upplevelser med Gud.

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Tv grannar
programme.desc: Rotter. Simon besoker sitt barndomshem med kusinen Magnus. Att forst sina rotter ar verkligen ngot som kan inspirera till att satta kurs, for vad vill vi egentligen lamna efter oss ihistoriebockerna?

programme.title: Jag motte Messias
programme.desc: Dan Strull. En modefotograf frn New York motte en nyfiken kvinna, p skidsemester i Aspen.

programme.title: Upptack livet
programme.desc: Den omsorgsfulla Guden. Var soker vi vr tillfredsstallelse? Jesus ar kallan med det levande vattnet, kallan till all tillfredsstallelse. Sluta forsoka slacka din torst i tomma brunnar som inte kan hlla vatten.

programme.title: Davids slunga
programme.desc: Honom kan jag bara inte missa. Ibland ska man g mot majoriteten for att kunna g Guds uppdrag. Att David kunde besegra Goliat lg inte i hans egna formga, utan i den tillit han hade p sin Herre och Gud.

programme.title: Lovsngens sprk
programme.desc: Wilson Bugembe 1/2. Pastorn och lovsngaren Wilson Bugembe frn Kampala i Uganda vaxte sjalv upp p gatan. Som vuxen startade han en kyrka, ett barnhem samt hjalper gatubarn till ett battre liv.

programme.title: Israel talar
programme.desc: Bibelns betydelse for israelerna. Judarna kallar Bibeln Bockernas bok. Vi utreder hur viktig Bockernas bok ar for israeler i dag.

programme.title: Det ar overnaturligt!
programme.desc: Gast ar Daniel Kolenda. Daniel Koleda ar attling till pingspastorer i fem led. Gud uppvackte hans farfarsfar frn doden. Nu ar Daniel evangelist och arbetar tillsammans med Reinhard Bonnke.

programme.title: Att hora Guds rost
programme.desc: Gud talar genom Anden i dig. Elia sg en storm, en jordbavning och en eldsvda men Gud var inte i ngon av dem. Sedan kom en svag susning. r det s nar Gud talar genom den Helige Ande? Med Andreas Hager och Louise Gustafsson.

programme.title: Lost Gold of World War II
programme.desc: Ryhma amerikkalaisia koettaa ratkaista yhden toisen maailmansodan isoista mysteereista. Heilla on apunaan silminnakija, kun he tutkivat Filippiineilla vuorta, jonne japanilaisen kenraali Yamashitan uskotaan haudanneen sodan aikana valtavan aarteen.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Loch Nessin hirvion mahdollista kuolemaa tutkii Robert Rines, joka naki jaanteet kartoittaessaan jarven pohjaa. MonsterQuest hyodyntaa ROV-laitteita, kaikuluotaimia ja kameroita etsiessaan todisteita Nessien kuolemasta jarven pohjasta.

programme.title: Maanalaiset kaupungit
programme.desc: Don Wildman sukeltaa Belizen viidakkojen alle, missa piilee hautoja, uhrialttareita, rituaaliluolia ja kirjaimellisia sisaankaynteja mayojen alamaailmaan.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Tutustu universumin myytteihin, vaarinkasityksiin, totuuksiin ja mysteereihin. Voisiko Marsilla olla elamaa? Onko aikamatkustus mahdollista Einsteinin suhteellisuusteorian valossa?

programme.title: Muinaiset avaruusoliot
programme.desc: Voiko vaitteissa niin sanotusta Yhdeksastaulkoavaruuden olentojen ihmiskuntaa hallitsevasta federaatiostaolla mitaan peraa? Jotkut asiantuntijat ovat sita mielta.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways The World Will End
programme.desc: Kun avaruusolennot hyokkaavat yllattaen maapallolle, ihmiset kuolevat kaduilla, hallitukset kaatuvat, kaupungit tuhoutuvat ja tappava virus tartuttaa ihmisia. Voiko ihmiskunta selviytya, vai onko loppu koittanut?

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Huippuasiantuntijat kayvat lapi parhaat mahdolliset todisteet ja silminnakijoiden lausunnot selvittaakseen, mita katastrofaalisissa luonnononnettomuuksissa todella on tapahtunut.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: J.R.R. Tolkienin fantasiamaailma on taynna hobitteja, orkkeja ja velhoja, vaan mitka tosimaailman tapahtumat innoittivat hanen eeppista tarinaansa Taru sormusten herrasta?

programme.title: Lost Gold of World War II

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways The World Will End
programme.desc: Asteroidin isku 65 miljoonaa vuotta sitten aiheutti dinosaurusten tuhon. Mita tapahtuisi, jos samanlainen kappale avaruudesta osuisi samaan kohtaan uudelleen? Miten modernit ihmiset sopeutuisivat sita seuraaviin katastrofeihin?
